```{r dbconfig.global, echo = F, include = F}
dsn_pwd<-''
```

```{r connectdb, echo = F, include = F}
tryCatch({
    drv <- dsn_driver
    print("Connecting to Databaseâ€¦")
    connec <- dbConnect(dsn_driver, 
                 dbname = dsn_db,
                 host = dsn_host,
                 port = dsn_port,
                 user = dsn_uid,
                 password = dsn_pwd)
    print("Database Connected!")
    },
    error=function(cond) {
            print("Unable to connect to Database.")
    })
```
